Method.name: SaveMethod
Method.Description: Save method of Mock to the global if does not already exist

Method.name: MethodCalled
Method.Description: Return right data when specific method is called

Method.name: GetMockedResponse
Method.Description: Retrieve right data from global if the method with specific parameters is mocked

Method.name: GetMockedResponseREST
Method.Description: Retrieve right data from global if the method with specific parameters is mocked. REST version.

Method.name: CreateMock
Method.Description: Creates new mock class if does not exist already. Generates class definition in 'MockFW.Mocks' to be possible calling methods on this class.
Method.Implementation:
set fullClassName = "MockFW.Mocks."_className
If (##class(%Dictionary.CompiledClass).%ExistsId(fullClassName)) { w "Mock with this name already exists!" quit '$$$OK }
set classDef=##class(%Dictionary.ClassDefinition).%New() set classDef.Name=fullClassName set classDef.ProcedureBlock=1 set classDef.Super = "MockFW.MockBase"
set methodDef = ##class(%Dictionary.MethodDefinition).%New() set methodDef.Name = "SaveMethod" set methodDef.ClassMethod = "1" set methodDef.ReturnType = "%Status" set methodDef.FormalSpec="methodName:%String,params,return,restMethod:%String="""",code=200,delay=0,force=0" do methodDef.Implementation.WriteLine($$$TAB_" set mockName = $PIECE($CLASSNAME(),""."",3) ") do methodDef.Implementation.WriteLine($$$TAB_" do ##super(mockName, methodName, params, return, restMethod, code, delay, force)") do classDef.Methods.Insert(methodDef)
set methodDef = ##class(%Dictionary.MethodDefinition).%New() set methodDef.Name = "%DispatchClassMethod" set methodDef.ClassMethod = "1" set methodDef.FormalSpec="Class:%String,methodName:%String,Args..." do methodDef.Implementation.WriteLine($$$TAB_" set mockName = $PIECE(Class,""."",3) ") do methodDef.Implementation.WriteLine($$$TAB_" quit ##class(MockFW.MockBase).MethodCalled(mockName, methodName, Args...)") do classDef.Methods.Insert(methodDef)
set methodDef = ##class(%Dictionary.MethodDefinition).%New() set methodDef.Name = "%DispatchMethod" set methodDef.FormalSpec="methodName:%String,Args..." do methodDef.Implementation.WriteLine($$$TAB_" set mockName = $PIECE($CLASSNAME(),""."",3) ") do methodDef.Implementation.WriteLine($$$TAB_" quit ##class(MockFW.MockBase).MethodCalled(mockName, methodName, Args...)") do classDef.Methods.Insert(methodDef)
do classDef.%Save() quit ##class(%SYSTEM.OBJ).Compile(fullClassName)

Method.name: SaveMethod
Method.Description: Save method of the certain mock to the global if the method with same parameters does not already exist To overwrite existing record adjust parametr force to 1
Method.Implementation: quit ##class(MockFW.MockBase).SaveMethod(mockName, methodName, params, response, restMethod, code, delay, force)

Method.name: SaveMethodsFromCSV
Method.Description: Import mock and mocks data from .csv file Import proccess from the second line with 'format Name of the Mock; Method(endpoint); parameters; Response; Rest method; Return code, delay, force'

Method.name: ExportMock
Method.Description: Is used when closing REST API into Docker Export Mock class and Mock data as a two files (.xml a .gof) dirPath = directory where you have folder with Iris docker + /durable/src mockName = e.g. MyMock

Method.name: ExportMockData
Method.Description: Auxiliary method, exports Mocks data
Method.Implementation: set global = "MockMat("_mockName set filePath = dirPath_mockName_"Global.gof" quit ##class(%Library.Global).Export(,global,filePath)

Method.name: ExportMockClass
Method.Description: Auxiliary method, exports Mock class
Method.Implementation: set fullClassName = "MockFW.Mocks."_mockName_".cls" set filePath = dirPath_mockName_"MockClass.xml" quit $system.OBJ.Export(fullClassName, filePath)

Method.name: GetAllMocks
Method.Description: Return all mocks as a %ListOfDataTypes and also write the list
Method.Implementation: #dim listMocks = ##class(%ListOfDataTypes).%New() set key = $Order(^MockMat("")) while (key '= "") { do listMocks.Insert(key) s key = $Order(^MockMat(key)) // next subscript } zwrite listMocks quit listMocks

Method.name: GetAllMethods
Method.Description: Return all Mock methods as a %ListOfDataTypes and also write the list
Method.Implementation: #dim listMethods = ##class(%ListOfDataTypes).%New() set key = $Order(^MockMat(mockName,"")) while (key '= "") { do listMethods.Insert(key) s key = $Order(^MockMat(mockName,key)) // next subscript } zwrite listMethods quit listMethods

Method.name: DeleteMethod
Method.Description: Delete specific method from specific mock (All records with different parameters)
Method.Implementation: kill ^MockMat(mockName, methodName) write "The method ", methodName, " from mock ", mockName, " no longer exist.", ! quit $$$OK

Method.name: DeleteMethodWithParametr
Method.Description: Delete specific method from specific mock with specific parameters

Method.name: DeleteMock
Method.Description: Delete Mock class definition and also clean global from this Mock (Mocks data)
Method.Implementation: Kill ^MockMat(mockName) quit ##class(%SYSTEM.OBJ).Delete("MockFW.Mocks."_mockName) write "The mock ", mockName, "no longer exists",!

Method.name: CleanAll
Method.Description: Delete all of the records and data
Method.Implementation: Kill ^MockMat quit ##class(%SYSTEM.OBJ).DeletePackage("MockFW.Mocks")

Method.name: InitMockForTest
Method.Description: Initialize mock name for testing purpose (parse mock name from instance of full class name)
Method.Implementation: quit $PIECE($CLASSNAME(serviceInstance),".",3)

Method.name: GenerateDocumentation
Method.Description: This method generates documentation for the certain mock Format of the documentation is XML for simple transformation to DocBook via XMLmind or other tools
Method.Implementation:
if inContainer { set filePath = "/opt/mockfw/export/" } set filePath = filePath_mockName_"Doc.xml" write "Generating documentation of the mock ", mockName, " to do ", filePath, ! set file=##class(%File).%New(filePath) do file.Open("WSN") do file.WriteLine("") do file.WriteLine("") do file.WriteLine("") do file.WriteLine($$$TAB_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(2)_""_mockName_" - Mock documentation") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(2)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(3)_""_$USERNAME_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(2)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(2)_""_$PIECE($ZDATETIME($ZTIMESTAMP,4,1,2)," ", 1)_"") do file.WriteLine($$$TAB_"") do file.WriteLine($$$TAB_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(2)_"ZK.Mocks."_mockName_"") // first local mocked methods set local = "false" #dim listMethods = ##class(%ListOfDataTypes).%New() set key = $Order(^MockMat(mockName,"")) while (key '= "") { do listMethods.Insert(key) s key = $Order(^MockMat(mockName,key)) // next subscript } set listMethodswithREST = ##class(%ListOfDataTypes).%New() for i=1:1:listMethods.Count() { set method = listMethods.GetAt(i) set first = "true" set firstREST = "true" set key = $Order(^MockMat(mockName, method, "")) while (key '= "") { if (key '= "GET") && (key '= "POST") && (key '= "PUT") && (key '= "DELETE") { if local = "false" { set local = "true" do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(2)_"
") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(3)_"Local mocked methods") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(3)_"") } if first="true" { set first="false" do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(4)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(5)_""_method_"()") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(5)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(6)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(7)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(7)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(7)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(8)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(9)_"Parameters") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(9)_"Response") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(8)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(7)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(7)_"") } do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(8)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(9)_""_key_"") set response = ^MockMat(mockName, method, key) do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(9)_""_response_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(8)_"") } else { if firstREST="true" { set firstRest="false" if listMethodswithREST.Find(method) = "" { do listMethodswithREST.Insert(method) } } } s key = $Order(^MockMat(mockName, method, key)) // next subscript } if first="false" { do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(7)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(6)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(5)_"
") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(4)_"") } } if local = "true" { do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(3)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(2)_"
") } // second REST mocked methods set port = "9092" set url = "http://localhost:"_port_"/api/mockfw/"_mockName_"/" do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(2)_"
") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(3)_"REST mocked methods") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(3)_"") for i=1:1:listMethodswithREST.Count() { set method = listMethodswithREST.GetAt(i) do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(4)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(5)_""_url_method_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(5)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(6)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(7)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(7)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(7)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(7)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(7)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(7)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(8)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(9)_"HTTP method") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(9)_"Body") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(9)_"Response") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(9)_"Return code") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(9)_"Delay(s)") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(8)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(7)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(7)_"") set restmethod = $Order(^MockMat(mockName, method, "")) while (restmethod '= "") { set param = $Order(^MockMat(mockName, method, restmethod, "")) while (param '= "") { do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(8)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(9)_""_restmethod_"") if param '= "GET" { do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(9)_""_param_"") } else { do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(9)_"") } set response = ^MockMat(mockName, method, restmethod, param) do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(9)_""_response_"") set code = ^MockMat(mockName, method, restmethod, param, "code") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(9)_""_code_"") set delay = ^MockMat(mockName, method, restmethod, param, "delay") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(9)_""_delay_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(8)_"") s param = $Order(^MockMat(mockName, method, restmethod, param)) // next params } s restmethod = $Order(^MockMat(mockName, method, restmethod)) // next restmethod } do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(7)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(6)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(5)_"
") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(4)_"") } do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(3)_"") do file.WriteLine(..Tabs(2)_"
") do file.WriteLine($$$TAB_"") do file.WriteLine("") return $$$OK

Method.name: %DispatchClassMethod
Method.Implementation: set mockName = $PIECE(Class,".",3) quit ##class(MockFW.MockBase).MethodCalled(mockName, methodName, Args...)

Method.name: %DispatchMethod
Method.Implementation: set mockName = $PIECE($CLASSNAME(),".",3) quit ##class(MockFW.MockBase).MethodCalled(mockName, methodName, Args...)

Method.name: SaveMethod
Method.Implementation: set mockName = $PIECE($CLASSNAME(),".",3) do ##super(mockName, methodName, params, return, restMethod, code, delay, force)

Method.name: OnPreDispatch
ReadRequestToObject
WriteResponse
WriteErrorResponse
Method.Implementation:
set %response.Status = 404 set stream=##class(%Stream.GlobalCharacter).%New() set response = {} set error = "Metoda s URL "_methodName_" pro mock "_mockName_" s parametry nenalezena." do response.%Set("Error",error)
do response.%ToJSON(stream) do stream.Rewind() while stream.AtEnd=0{ write:encode=0 stream.Read() write:encode=1 $zconvert(stream.Read(),"I","UTF8") } quit SC

Method.name: GetQuery

XData.name: UrlMap
XData.Data: <Routes> <Route Url="/ping" Method="GET" Call="Test" Cors="false" /> <Route Url="/:mockName/(.+)" Method="POST" Call="Dispatch" Cors="false" /> <Route Url="/:mockName/(.+)" Method="GET" Call="Dispatch" Cors="false" /> <Route Url="/:mockName/(.+)" Method="PUT" Call="Dispatch" Cors="false" /> <Route Url="/:mockName/(.+)" Method="DELETE" Call="Dispatch" Cors="false" /> </Routes>

Method.name: Test
Method.Implementation: w pong q $$$OK

Method.name: Dispatch
Method.Description: Dispatch method which is called for every endpoint. Distribute the request to the MockBase class

Method.name: Tabs
Method.Description: Method, which add multiple $$$TAB to line of generated code

Method.name: CutExtraQuotes
Method.Description: Auxiliary method for retrieving from .csv. Cut extra double quotes to corect saving

Method.name: Compare
Method.Description: Compare two strings (potentionally objects)

Method.name: CompareObjects
Method.Description: Method compare two dynamic objects

Method.name: CompareArrays
Method.Description: Method compare two dynamic arrays

Method.name: CanConvertToJSON
Method.Description: Return '1' if the string can be transformed to the object, else '0' Use regex syntax. Work right only for 2-3 layers of json object
Method.Implementation:
set jsonWithoutSpaces = $ZSTRIP(json,"*W") set item = "(\""[:alnum:]+\"")" set itemValue = "((\""[:alnum:]+\"")|([:digit:]+))" set element = item_"\:"_itemValue set object = "\{("_element_"\,)*"_element_"\}" set array = "((\[((("_element_"\,)*"_element_")|(("_object _"\,)*"_object_")|(("_itemValue _"\,)*"_itemValue_"))\])|(\[\]))"
set objectInObject = item_"\:"_object set arrayInObject = item_"\:"_array
set regex = "\{((("_element_")|("_objectInObject_")|("_arrayInObject_"))\,)*(("_element_")|("_objectInObject_")|("_arrayInObject_"))\}"
return $match(jsonWithoutSpaces, regex)

Method.name: CountAtributes
Method.Description: Auxiliary method. Count the atributes of object

Method.name: TransformArgsToList
Method.Description: Transfrom arguments to the list as %ListOfDataTypes
